message: Javadoc comment at column 3 has parse error. Details: no viable alternative at input ' {@code * Query query = Query.entityQueryBuilder() * .kind("Person") * .filter(PropertyFilter.eq("favoriteFood", "pizza")) * .build(); * QueryResults results = datastore.run(query); * // Consume some results (using results.next()) and do any other actions as necessary. * query = query.toBuilder().startCursor(results.cursorAfter()).build(); * results = datastore.run(query); // now we will iterate over all entities not yet consumed * ======= * Returns the Cursor for the point after the value returned in the last {@link #next} call. * Currently, {@code cursorAfter} returns null in all cases but the last result. >>>>>>> upstream/master ' while parsing HTML_TAG
